author: mragonrider
title: Are we sure this is lego?!!?
review:
When I first got this set, I had no idea it was made by Lego. i mean, the whole thing is one piece and it looks more like some Barbie accessory than a cool new Lego set. it's not even that bad of a set, it just looks nothing like Lego! And what's up with the creepy knock-off Bratz girl picture on the top of it? I was so creepy that I tore it off and replaced it with a horse picture. Ahh, much better!

So, all in all, at least it's useful for storing my jewelry, but couldn't any toy company have made a pink jewelry box? Just wondering what Lego was thinking when they made these sets!
